heading: HB02839
0: AN ACT GRANTING CIVIL SERVICE ELIGIBILITY TO GOVERNMENT EMPLOYEES, UNDER CERTAIN CONDITIONS, WHOSE STATUS OF APPOINTMENT IS EITHER CASUAL OR CONTRACTUAL AND WHO HAVE RENDERED A TOTAL OF FIVE YEARS OF EFFICIENT SERVICE
status: Pending with the Committee on CIVIL SERVICE AND PROFESSIONAL REGULATION since 2016-08-17
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02839
FULL TITLE : AN ACT GRANTING CIVIL SERVICE ELIGIBILITY TO GOVERNMENT EMPLOYEES, UNDER CERTAIN CONDITIONS, WHOSE STATUS OF APPOINTMENT IS EITHER CASUAL OR CONTRACTUAL AND WHO HAVE RENDERED A TOTAL OF FIVE YEARS OF EFFICIENT SERVICE
ABSTRACT : Grants civil service eligibility to government employees, under certain conditions, whose status of appointment is either casual or contractual who have rendered a total of at least five (5) years of efficient service.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BAGUILAT, TEDDY JR. BRAWNER
DATE FILED : 2016-08-10
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON CIVIL SERVICE AND PROFESSIONAL REGULATION ON 2016-08-17
